database.title: 13 Minutes
database.plot: As a new day begins in the small American town of Minninnewah, the residents start their day as ordinary as the next. Mother Nature, however, has other plans for them. Inhabitants have just 13 minutes to seek shelter before the largest tornado on record ravages the town, leaving them struggling to protect their loved ones and fighting for their lives. Left to deal with the aftermath, four families must overcome their differences and find strength in each other in order to survive.
database.outline: As a new day begins in the small American town of Minninnewah, the residents start their day as ordinary as the next. Mother Nature, however, has other plans for them. Inhabitants have just 13 minutes to seek shelter before the largest tornado on record ravages the town, leaving them struggling to protect their loved ones and fighting for their lives. Left to deal with the aftermath, four families must overcome their differences and find strength in each other in order to survive.
database.original_filename: 13 Minutes (2021) 720p 10bit BluRay x265 HEVC [Org AMZN Hindi DDP 2.0 _224Kbps + English DDP 2.0] ESub _ Immortal.mkv

database.title: The 355
database.plot: A group of top female agents from American, British, Chinese, Columbian and German  government agencies are drawn together to try and stop an organization from acquiring a deadly weapon to send the world into chaos.
database.outline: A group of top female agents from American, British, Chinese, Columbian and German  government agencies are drawn together to try and stop an organization from acquiring a deadly weapon to send the world into chaos.
database.languages: 英文, 阿拉伯文, 西班牙文, Chinese, 法文, 德文

database.title: A Writer's Odyssey
database.plot: Kongwen Lu is the author of a fantasy novel series following a heroic teenager, also named Kongwen, on a quest to end the tyrannical rule of Lord Redmane, under the guidance of a Black Armor. But through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world, leading Guan Ning to accept a mission from Tu Ling to kill the author.
database.outline: Kongwen Lu is the author of a fantasy novel series following a heroic teenager, also named Kongwen, on a quest to end the tyrannical rule of Lord Redmane, under the guidance of a Black Armor. But through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world, leading Guan Ning to accept a mission from Tu Ling to kill the author.
studio: 华策影业（上海）有限公司

database.title: Breaking News in Yuba County
database.plot: An overlooked pencil-pusher catches her husband in bed with another woman, the shock of which causes him to die of a heart attack. So she buries his body and takes advantage of the growing celebrity status that comes from having a missing husband. But she quickly finds herself in over her head, dodging cops and criminals, all while trying to keep the truth from her sister, a local news anchor who’s desperate for a story.
database.outline: An overlooked pencil-pusher catches her husband in bed with another woman, the shock of which causes him to die of a heart attack. So she buries his body and takes advantage of the growing celebrity status that comes from having a missing husband. But she quickly finds herself in over her head, dodging cops and criminals, all while trying to keep the truth from her sister, a local news anchor who’s desperate for a story.
database.tagline: Sue Buttons has one killer story

database.title: Connected
database.plot: A debt collector receives a call from a woman who is kidnapped by an unknown gang. He thinks it is a joke but soon, he realises that it is not a prank.
database.outline: A debt collector receives a call from a woman who is kidnapped by an unknown gang. He thinks it is a joke but soon, he realises that it is not a prank.
database.languages: 广州话, 廣州話, Chinese, English

database.title: 杀破狼·贪狼
database.plot: 香港警察李忠志（古天乐 饰）得知女儿芝（陈汉娜 饰）于泰国旅游间莫名失踪，即亲赴泰国报警求助。负责案件的华人探员崔杰（吴樾 饰），应允让他一同调查，却想不到李忠志利用媒体呼吁市民提供线索。 一条意外拍下芝被捉走的片段上载至警方网站，却被神秘删除。崔杰即连同好友兼同袍Tak（托尼·贾 饰）同赴寻找片主，却遇神秘人马截足灭证，狭路相逢，展开追截并与之搏斗。李忠志与崔杰两人逐步调查，却发现案中有案，并开始意识凶手背后神秘势力非他们能对付……
database.outline: 香港警察李忠志（古天乐 饰）得知女儿芝（陈汉娜 饰）于泰国旅游间莫名失踪，即亲赴泰国报警求助。负责案件的华人探员崔杰（吴樾 饰），应允让他一同调查，却想不到李忠志利用媒体呼吁市民提供线索。 一条意外拍下芝被捉走的片段上载至警方网站，却被神秘删除。崔杰即连同好友兼同袍Tak（托尼·贾 饰）同赴寻找片主，却遇神秘人马截足灭证，狭路相逢，展开追截并与之搏斗。李忠志与崔杰两人逐步调查，却发现案中有案，并开始意识凶手背后神秘势力非他们能对付……

database.title: 廿二世紀殺人網絡
database.plot: 里奧是廿二世紀電腦高手和奪網奇才，經常被夢境困擾，其後察覺自己的生活被一股來自邪惡網絡世界的無形力量操縱。某天里奧遇上神秘女子珍妮蒂，她帶領他到達地下世界；里奧認識了地下組織袖摩菲士，始發現人類正活在一個「模擬現實世界」而不自知。里奧決定拯救人類，並向邪惡網絡世界宣戰。
database.outline: 里奧是廿二世紀電腦高手和奪網奇才，經常被夢境困擾，其後察覺自己的生活被一股來自邪惡網絡世界的無形力量操縱。某天里奧遇上神秘女子珍妮蒂，她帶領他到達地下世界；里奧認識了地下組織袖摩菲士，始發現人類正活在一個「模擬現實世界」而不自知。里奧決定拯救人類，並向邪惡網絡世界宣戰。

database.title: 廿二世紀殺人網絡2：決戰未來
database.plot: 在顯示出救世主身份不久後，尼歐（Neo）進一步學會運用他在母體（Matrix）的超級能力，包括看清周圍人和物的代碼，以及飛行。人類的革命也劇烈反轉，越來越多的人從母體中獲得了自由。此時尼歐開始不斷地夢見崔妮蒂（Trinity）的死亡。另一方面，機器聚集了一支大軍進攻人類抵抗的中心：真實世界最後的城市錫安（Zion）。莫菲斯（Morpheus）和尼歐則焦急地等待和祭師（Oracle）的聯繫，他們相信，祭師會告訴他們如何阻止災難。特工史密斯（Smith）由於在第一集中對尼歐追捕失敗被系統刪除，如今脫離母體並成為電腦病毒重新出現，他可以傳染任何被他接觸的人（將其複製成自己），他生存的目的就是為了消滅尼歐。為了拯救錫安、人類以及他最愛的女人，尼歐和莫菲斯及其他抵抗分子必須與各種被「流放」的程式、新升級的特工、以及一群史密斯的複製品戰鬥，以便到達萬物之源（the Source）。但是在萬物之源，尼歐了解到的卻是動搖之前所有認知的真相……
database.outline: 在顯示出救世主身份不久後，尼歐（Neo）進一步學會運用他在母體（Matrix）的超級能力，包括看清周圍人和物的代碼，以及飛行。人類的革命也劇烈反轉，越來越多的人從母體中獲得了自由。此時尼歐開始不斷地夢見崔妮蒂（Trinity）的死亡。另一方面，機器聚集了一支大軍進攻人類抵抗的中心：真實世界最後的城市錫安（Zion）。莫菲斯（Morpheus）和尼歐則焦急地等待和祭師（Oracle）的聯繫，他們相信，祭師會告訴他們如何阻止災難。特工史密斯（Smith）由於在第一集中對尼歐追捕失敗被系統刪除，如今脫離母體並成為電腦病毒重新出現，他可以傳染任何被他接觸的人（將其複製成自己），他生存的目的就是為了消滅尼歐。為了拯救錫安、人類以及他最愛的女人，尼歐和莫菲斯及其他抵抗分子必須與各種被「流放」的程式、新升級的特工、以及一群史密斯的複製品戰鬥，以便到達萬物之源（the Source）。但是在萬物之源，尼歐了解到的卻是動搖之前所有認知的真相……

database.title: 廿二世紀殺人網絡 復活次元
database.plot: 全球千呼萬喚，影迷期待多年，2022最震撼的壓軸電影盛事《22世紀殺人網絡 復活次元》(The Matrix Resurrections)，由原裝系列導演蓮娜華高斯基(Lana Wachowski)捲土重來，掌舵奇洛李維斯(Keanu Reeves)、嘉麗安摩絲(Carrie-Anne Moss)強勢回歸，演繹當年令他們爆紅的傳奇角色Neo及Trinity，再續科幻經典，勢必掀起最強狂熱。  《22世紀殺人網絡 復活次元》重回有兩個現實的世界，一個是日常生活，另一個則是存在於日常的背後。湯瑪斯安德森想要找出他的現實是真實的，還是想像出來的，同時真正了解自己，所以他必須再次選擇「跟著白兔走」。儘管一切都像是幻覺，但如果湯瑪斯（或是尼歐）曾經學到什麼，那就是唯有透過選擇才能進出母體，尋找背後的真相。雖然尼歐早就知道他會做出何種選擇，但他不知道的是，母體變得比以前更強大、更堅固、更危險……似曾相識。
database.outline: 全球千呼萬喚，影迷期待多年，2022最震撼的壓軸電影盛事《22世紀殺人網絡 復活次元》(The Matrix Resurrections)，由原裝系列導演蓮娜華高斯基(Lana Wachowski)捲土重來，掌舵奇洛李維斯(Keanu Reeves)、嘉麗安摩絲(Carrie-Anne Moss)強勢回歸，演繹當年令他們爆紅的傳奇角色Neo及Trinity，再續科幻經典，勢必掀起最強狂熱。  《22世紀殺人網絡 復活次元》重回有兩個現實的世界，一個是日常生活，另一個則是存在於日常的背後。湯瑪斯安德森想要找出他的現實是真實的，還是想像出來的，同時真正了解自己，所以他必須再次選擇「跟著白兔走」。儘管一切都像是幻覺，但如果湯瑪斯（或是尼歐）曾經學到什麼，那就是唯有透過選擇才能進出母體，尋找背後的真相。雖然尼歐早就知道他會做出何種選擇，但他不知道的是，母體變得比以前更強大、更堅固、更危險……似曾相識。

database.title: 廿二世紀殺人網絡3：驚變世紀
database.plot: 尼歐、崔尼蒂、莫斐斯及其他英雄在廿二世紀殺人網絡3驚變世紀中激戰連場，正處於勝利或被機械軍團殲滅的邊緣。對尼歐來說，如同向人類極限挑戰 - 走進機械城市心臟的同時，在生死關頭與戰鬥力不齗提升的程式人史密斯決一死戰。
database.outline: 尼歐、崔尼蒂、莫斐斯及其他英雄在廿二世紀殺人網絡3驚變世紀中激戰連場，正處於勝利或被機械軍團殲滅的邊緣。對尼歐來說，如同向人類極限挑戰 - 走進機械城市心臟的同時，在生死關頭與戰鬥力不齗提升的程式人史密斯決一死戰。

database.title: The Avengers
database.plot: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!
database.outline: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!

database.title: Joker
database.plot: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.
database.outline: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

database.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
database.plot: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.
database.outline: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.
database.tagline: Mysterious. Dangerous. Reptilious. You've never seen heroes like this.

database.title: Independence Day
database.plot: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped 'destroyer' spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet. On July 3, the United States conducts a coordinated counterattack that fails. On July 4, a plan is devised to gain access to the interior of the alien mothership in space, in order to plant a nuclear missile.
database.outline: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped 'destroyer' spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet. On July 3, the United States conducts a coordinated counterattack that fails. On July 4, a plan is devised to gain access to the interior of the alien mothership in space, in order to plant a nuclear missile.

database.title: 不赦島
database.plot: 聯邦警員泰迪（里安納度狄卡比奧 飾）奉命到一座位於孤島的精神病囚犯監獄，調查一宗女殺人犯離奇失蹤的案件。過程中，泰迪發現這座四周彌漫著一片詭異氣氛的監獄內，隱藏著極多不為人知的秘密...  正當泰迪自以為掌握到破案的重要證據時，院方竟企圖向他下毒手。此時，颱風突然吹襲，切斷了「不赦島」與外界的聯繫，島內的瘋狂罪犯於是趁機逃走﹗愈趨混亂的狀況、草木皆兵的困局，令他的精神逐漸錯亂，甚至分不清真相和假象！此時，段段充滿罪疚的回憶洶湧襲來，不斷被各方追捕的泰迪，開始懷疑自己的記憶、同僚、甚至自己警察的身份？﹗
database.outline: 聯邦警員泰迪（里安納度狄卡比奧 飾）奉命到一座位於孤島的精神病囚犯監獄，調查一宗女殺人犯離奇失蹤的案件。過程中，泰迪發現這座四周彌漫著一片詭異氣氛的監獄內，隱藏著極多不為人知的秘密...  正當泰迪自以為掌握到破案的重要證據時，院方竟企圖向他下毒手。此時，颱風突然吹襲，切斷了「不赦島」與外界的聯繫，島內的瘋狂罪犯於是趁機逃走﹗愈趨混亂的狀況、草木皆兵的困局，令他的精神逐漸錯亂，甚至分不清真相和假象！此時，段段充滿罪疚的回憶洶湧襲來，不斷被各方追捕的泰迪，開始懷疑自己的記憶、同僚、甚至自己警察的身份？﹗
database.tagline: 孤島監獄 罪犯失蹤 刑警深入調查 卻身陷瘋狂殺機 是精心佈局 還是冤魂死不瞑目？

database.title: Alita: Battle Angel
database.plot: When Alita awakens with no memory of who she is in a future world she does not recognize, she is taken in by Ido, a compassionate doctor who realizes that somewhere in this abandoned cyborg shell is the heart and soul of a young woman with an extraordinary past.
database.outline: When Alita awakens with no memory of who she is in a future world she does not recognize, she is taken in by Ido, a compassionate doctor who realizes that somewhere in this abandoned cyborg shell is the heart and soul of a young woman with an extraordinary past.
database.tagline: An angel falls. A warrior rises.

database.title: Restless
database.plot: After going to extremes to cover up an accident, a corrupt cop's life spirals out of control when he starts receiving threats from a mysterious witness.
database.outline: After going to extremes to cover up an accident, a corrupt cop's life spirals out of control when he starts receiving threats from a mysterious witness.

database.title: 咒術屍戰
database.plot: 在兇殺案現場，發現了被害者與嫌犯的遺體。然而，嫌犯早已在三個月前死亡，令警方陷入混亂。另一方面，追查懸疑案件的記者林珍熙（嚴志媛 飾）在電台節目中，接到自稱是殺人案真兇的電話，對方表示想在直播中接受專訪。全城都因而十分關注林珍熙主持的直播節目，將於專訪當天現身的疑犯更預告會喚醒活屍「在此矣」，更將會再犯下三宗殺人案！ 而預告殺人的那天，出現了龐大的「在此矣」喪屍軍團，開始無差別攻擊群眾，即使警方出動所有警力也束手無策，究竟操控一眾喪屍的幕後主腦是誰？能夠抗衡喪屍軍團，有望阻止他們的「詛咒師」與記者裡應外合，成為全城唯一的希望⋯⋯
database.outline: 在兇殺案現場，發現了被害者與嫌犯的遺體。然而，嫌犯早已在三個月前死亡，令警方陷入混亂。另一方面，追查懸疑案件的記者林珍熙（嚴志媛 飾）在電台節目中，接到自稱是殺人案真兇的電話，對方表示想在直播中接受專訪。全城都因而十分關注林珍熙主持的直播節目，將於專訪當天現身的疑犯更預告會喚醒活屍「在此矣」，更將會再犯下三宗殺人案！ 而預告殺人的那天，出現了龐大的「在此矣」喪屍軍團，開始無差別攻擊群眾，即使警方出動所有警力也束手無策，究竟操控一眾喪屍的幕後主腦是誰？能夠抗衡喪屍軍團，有望阻止他們的「詛咒師」與記者裡應外合，成為全城唯一的希望⋯⋯

database.title: Blacklight
database.plot: Travis Block is a shadowy Government agent who specializes in removing operatives whose covers have been exposed. He then has to uncover a deadly conspiracy within his own ranks that reaches the highest echelons of power.
database.outline: Travis Block is a shadowy Government agent who specializes in removing operatives whose covers have been exposed. He then has to uncover a deadly conspiracy within his own ranks that reaches the highest echelons of power.

database.title: 爆機自由仁
database.plot: 電腦遊戲「自由城市」裡的銀行職員阿仁（賴恩雷諾士 飾演），日日過住刻板重複的生活，突然驚覺自己是背景角色，誓要不惜一切扭轉命運 ！在虛擬人物Molotov Girl的協助下，由閒角「任何仁」變身「爆機自由仁」，拯救面臨摺埋的遊戲！
database.outline: 電腦遊戲「自由城市」裡的銀行職員阿仁（賴恩雷諾士 飾演），日日過住刻板重複的生活，突然驚覺自己是背景角色，誓要不惜一切扭轉命運 ！在虛擬人物Molotov Girl的協助下，由閒角「任何仁」變身「爆機自由仁」，拯救面臨摺埋的遊戲！
database.tagline: 今鋪．．．唔再做閒人，誓要做超「仁」！

database.title: Aquaman
database.plot: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur Curry, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne.
database.outline: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur Curry, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne.

database.title: Black Panther
database.plot: King T'Challa returns home to the reclusive, technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda to serve as his country's new leader. However, T'Challa soon finds that he is challenged for the throne by factions within his own country as well as without. Using powers reserved to Wakandan kings, T'Challa assumes the Black Panther mantle to join with ex-girlfriend Nakia, the queen-mother, his princess-kid sister, members of the Dora Milaje (the Wakandan 'special forces') and an American secret agent, to prevent Wakanda from being dragged into a world war.
database.outline: King T'Challa returns home to the reclusive, technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda to serve as his country's new leader. However, T'Challa soon finds that he is challenged for the throne by factions within his own country as well as without. Using powers reserved to Wakandan kings, T'Challa assumes the Black Panther mantle to join with ex-girlfriend Nakia, the queen-mother, his princess-kid sister, members of the Dora Milaje (the Wakandan 'special forces') and an American secret agent, to prevent Wakanda from being dragged into a world war.

database.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
database.plot: It has been ten years since The Battle of the Breach and the oceans are still, but restless. Vindicated by the victory at the Breach, the Jaeger program has evolved into the most powerful global defense force in human history. The PPDC now calls upon the best and brightest to rise up and become the next generation of heroes when the Kaiju threat returns.
database.outline: It has been ten years since The Battle of the Breach and the oceans are still, but restless. Vindicated by the victory at the Breach, the Jaeger program has evolved into the most powerful global defense force in human history. The PPDC now calls upon the best and brightest to rise up and become the next generation of heroes when the Kaiju threat returns.

database.title: 捍衛生死線
database.plot: 由奇洛李維斯飾演的神經科學家 William Foster 在一次車禍中失去了妻子和 3 名子女，而他在科學家好友 Ed Whittle（由 Thomas Middleditch 飾演）的幫忙下，把妻子和子女的意識轉移到復製人身上，讓他們「起死回生」，但此舉卻為他帶來了意想不到的危機，電影所引了德道和倫理的問題絕對是值得反思的課題。
